channel.title: Normalize Samples
channel.description: Hi, i want to normalize samples I recorded and stored with table read. how is this possible. some sound sources are really quite for my sampler and I want to compress the recordings and to normalize them, so that they are loud too. is there a possibility?

item.title: Normalize Samples
item.dc:creator: @Nippon
item.description:
@Nippon wrote:

Hi,
i want to normalize samples I recorded and stored with table read. how is this possible.
some sound sources are really quite for my sampler and I want to compress the recordings and to normalize them, so that they are loud too.
is there a possibility?
